creator: rschmid-apache@raptor.net
text:
It would be great if there was an option in Junit to exclude the listings of
tests which have passed.  Keep the summary, of course, but only display
errors/failures.

Thanks

creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
This could easily be accomplished with some XSL formatting tweaks.  Given that the customization 
capability already exists, I'm going to mark this as WONTFIX.  If you'd like to contribute your XSL files 
back, perhaps we incorporate them into future distributions.
